title: Amadis Video Converter [AVI/WMV/MPEG/MOVSWF/FLV]
description: Amadis AVI/WMV/MPEG/MOV Video Converter is an all-in-one video converter application, which, is more powerful and conversion from videos toAVI (DivX, XviD, etc.), DV AVI, MP4 (inc. Sony PSP, Apple iPod, Archos DVR, Creative Zen), WMV, 3GP, 3G2, QuickTime (MOV, QT), SWF, DVD, VOB, VRO, MPEG 1,2, MPG, DAT, VCD, SVCD, ASF, MJPEG, H.263, H.264, Real Video (RM, RMVB), DVR-MS. Very user-friendly interface and easy to use. Very quick in conversion speed and no quality is lost!
